Name: limit_team_size_max
Description: A team should not have more than 9 members

Name: limit_team_size_min
Description: A team must have at least 3 members

Name: sprint_duration_limit
Description: A sprint's duration must not exceed 4 weeks (28 days)

Name: daily_scrum_duration
Description: The Daily Scrum meeting must be exactly 15 minutes long

Name: sprint_backlog_capacity
Description: The total effort of tasks in a sprint backlog must not exceed team velocity

Name: worker_must_have_role
Description: Each worker must be assigned at least one role

Name: task_completion_required
Description: A User Story cannot be 'Done' unless all its tasks are 'Done'

Name: team_requires_scrum_master
Description: Every team must be supported by one Scrum Master

Name: positive_project_budget
Description: The budget for any project must be a non-negative value

Name: positive_user_story_priority
Description: The priority for any user story must be greater than zero

Name: positive_task_effort
Description: The effort for any task must be a positive number

Name: po_manages_one_backlog
Description: A Product Owner must manage exactly one Product Backlog
